Title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
Description: This project is a neural network-based solution for recognizing handwritten digits using the MNIST dataset. The implementation leverages TensorFlow and Keras for building and training the model.

Title: Customer Satisfaction Rating System
Description: Using fuzzy logic, the system assesses customer satisfaction based on various parameters such as service quality, food quality, and ambiance. The fuzzy inference system processes these inputs to provide a more accurate and human-like evaluation of customer satisfaction.

Title: Personal Portfolio V1
Description: Developed my first personal portfolio. simple html, tailwindcss , and Javascript

Title: Sukishiro
Description: Showcases the UI/UX design for SUKISHIRO, an anime streaming platform with a built-in community feature.

Title: Indonesia Earthquake Map
Description: Indonesia Earthquake map by utilizing mapbox, vite, react. Providing realtime data from BMKG
